title: Create NK SYSTECH business website (Home, About, Services, Contact) with inquiry form

requirements.text: Create a responsive multi-section business website for “NK SYSTECH” with clear navigation and content for: Home, About, Services, and Contact.

quotes: Im creating a Business type site for college project Business name: NK SYSTECH ,  Business type CCTV ,Workstation, Networking,Laptops, Computers Multibrand Sales and Service

acceptanceCriteria: A top navigation (desktop) and mobile menu allow users to reach Home, About, Services, and Contact sections/pages
All pages/sections display the business name “NK SYSTECH” prominently
Site is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop sizes

requirements.text: Add a Services area that clearly lists and describes NK SYSTECH offerings for: CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, and Computers, emphasizing multibrand sales and service.

quotes: Business type CCTV ,Workstation, Networking,Laptops, Computers Multibrand Sales and Service

acceptanceCriteria: Services section/page includes at least five service cards/blocks: CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers
Each service includes a short description in English and a clear “Sales & Service” emphasis
Services are presented in a consistent layout (grid/list) that adapts responsively

requirements.text: Add a simple “Products / Multibrand Sales & Service” listing component to showcase categories (not individual SKUs) relevant to CCTV and computer/networking equipment.
acceptanceCriteria: A listing UI exists that presents categories (e.g., Cameras/DVR/NVR, Routers/Switches, Laptops, Desktops, Workstations) without requiring pricing or inventory
Each category item includes a short label and a brief supporting line of text
The listing is accessible from the Services section/page or Home page

requirements.text: Implement a Contact section/page with a form that collects: name, phone number, email, service interest (dropdown), and message; submit the inquiry to the backend for storage and show success/error feedback in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields: Name, Phone, Email, Service Interest, Message, plus a Submit button
Client-side validation prevents empty required fields and clearly indicates validation errors
On submit, the UI shows a loading state and then a success message when stored, or an error message if it fails
Backend stores inquiries in stable state and exposes a method to create an inquiry and a method to list inquiries (for basic verification/testing)

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for a tech services business (e.g., clean industrial tech) using a consistent color palette, typography, spacing, and components across all pages/sections (avoid default/unstyled template look).
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is applied across navigation, headings, buttons, cards, and footer
Color palette avoids blue/purple as dominant colors and remains readable with sufficient contrast
Layout feels intentional (hero/sections spacing, consistent card styling, consistent button styles)

requirements.text: Add a footer with NK SYSTECH basic business info placeholders (address placeholder, phone placeholder, email placeholder) and quick links to Home/About/Services/Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer renders on all pages/sections
Footer contains NK SYSTECH name and placeholder contact details in English
Footer includes working quick links to the site’s main sections/pages

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the UI (logo in header/footer, hero/banner on Home, icons/illustrations in Services).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served from backend)
Logo image is used in the header and footer
Hero/banner image appears on the Home page/section
Service icons/illustrations appear in the Services section/page

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text
Respect single-actor Motoko backend architecture (all logic in backend/main.mo)
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose them from the app code instead
Do not add third-party auth providers; only Internet Identity is allowed (not required for this site)
Do not integrate external email/SMS/push services; contact submissions must be stored on-canister if implemented
nonGoals: E-commerce checkout, payments, inventory management, or real-time stock tracking
Third-party CRM/email delivery integration for contact messages
User accounts/admin dashboard beyond a simple inquiry listing endpoint for verification

required: Minimal modern tech logo, textless emblem/mark (nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner for a tech services business (cctv cameras, networking, laptops/workstations), clean and modern (nk-systech-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of 5 simple line/flat icons: CCTV, Workstation, Networking, Laptop, Desktop Computer (nk-systech-service-icons.dim_1024x256.png)

preferencesToAdd: User-facing site copy should be in English
miscToAdd: Business type: CCTV, Workstation, Networking, Laptops, Computers; multibrand sales and service
